content: /V/ /1.1/ Monitoring Report, Version 1.0, dated 05/10/2023 (Initial Version) /1.2/ Monitoring Report, Version 1.3, dated 15/02/2024 (Final Version) /2/ /2.1/ Draft Emission Reduction calculation sheet (corresponding to initial Version of VCS MR) /2.2/ Final Emission Reduction calculation Sheet (corresponding to final Version of VCS MR) /3/ VCS Standard Version v4.5 https://verra.org/project/vcs-program/rules-and-requirements, /4/ VCS Program Guide, v4.4 https://verra.org/project/vcs-program/rules-and-requirements, /5/ | Registered VCS PD version 2.1 dated 13/10/2016 /6/ Web-Link for the Registered project activity for Validation Report and Grid Emission factor calculation https://registry.verra.org/app/projectDetail/VCS/1522 /T/ Approved monitoring methodology: ACMO002 ver. 16.0 - Grid-connected electricity generation from renewable sources /8/ Websites referred: http://www. itouchmap.com/latlong.html(Latitude-Longitude location finder) /9/ Photos of major equipment (turbine, alternator and meters) along with Video of project site /10/ Date of operation of each project unit: Final Works Supervision Report (Technical report of the works) by Tractebel engineering (a consultant company providing technical services to the project proponent), Document number: SBR-TEF-RF-18-01-B, dated 17-05-2019 /11/ Declaration by PP for No double counting of Emission Reductions, Date: 10/02/2024
